attributes.action: Give tougher punishment for parents who break a court order in respect to contact orders (children)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I myself have been stopped from seeing my son on several occasions for many silly reasons (letting him see his paternal grandmother (her mum) and just because "she" didn't want me to))All in all over the last year I have missed 9 months of contact with my son,when taken to court the judge just slapped her wrist telling her not to do it again...........only for it to happen again!

I petition that any person who has custody of a child and has a court order stating contact rights to the other father/mother should be fined or serve a tougher punishment than a slap on the wrist if they break that court order.
